channel.title: 3 simple questions.., I'm just a noob :]
channel.description:
'Ello, thanks for trying to read this topic and helping me! ;)
[b]My source base:[/b] Fr33sc4p3 pkz
[b]Question #1.[/b] How can I change the X and Y coordiation for first player log in? I want to change to [b]X 2852, Y 2954[/b]
[b]Question #2.[/b] How can I put "::char" automatically when first player log in? (My source already have ::char working)
[b]Question #3.[/b] How can I get rid of nulls in my server? I see really good server.., without nulls. I don't want to have nooby server :(.
Thank you for trying to support my server by helping me in this topic! And, try do not flame this topic :S ~ [b]Cheesy[/b]
P.S. If you can able to answer some questions, or all, or whatever.., try to say, like for the example "I'm answering on question #3!"
Thank you, I'm trying my best on english.., not very well on english grammer :O Thanks XD

[/quote]

You don’t ‘script’ Java. Keep the topic on track guys.[/quote]

Exactly.Java and Javascript are a whole different language =)

item.title: 3 simple questions.., I'm just a noob :]
item.dc:creator: @Cheesy_G13 Cheesy_G13
item.description:
@Cheesy_G13 wrote:

Um… i will try… :s[br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2007, 01:32:43 AM[/size][hr]where is progress boodlean? im noob[br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2007, 01:53:39 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Inmate, post:14, topic:131080”][quote]Question #1.
How can I change the X and Y coordiation for first player log in?
I want to change to X 2852, Y 2954

Question #2.
How can I put “::char” automatically when first player log in? (My source already have ::char working)

Question #3.
How can I get rid of nulls in my server? I see really good server…, without nulls. I don’t want to have nooby server .[/quote]

#1
In Player.java search for // initial x and y coordinates of the player and change the coords below

#2
under the coords add server.client.showInterface(####);//for id search(“char”) in client

#3
under process boolean add

if(server.playerHandler.players[i] == null) { disconnected = true; }[/quote]

On question #2. not working. same boring menu pop-up -.- not char[br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2007, 02:04:48 AM[/size][hr]'Ello??

Read full topic

nov9862:

Inmate for your # 2 it dosent work. You need the // in front of it.

item.title: 3 simple questions.., I'm just a noob :]
item.dc:creator: @Inmate1 Inmate™
item.description:
@Inmate1 wrote:

Question #1. How can I change the X and Y coordiation for first player log in? I want to change to X 2852, Y 2954

Question #2.
How can I put “::char” automatically when first player log in? (My source already have ::char working)

Question #3.
How can I get rid of nulls in my server? I see really good server…, without nulls. I don’t want to have nooby server .

#1
In Player.java search for // initial x and y coordinates of the player and change the coords below

#2
under the coords add server.client.showInterface(####);//for id search(“char”) in client

#3
under process boolean add

if(server.playerHandler.players[i] == null) { disconnected = true; }

Read full topic

Question 1: Open up player.java now scroll down a bit til you see the coordinates to original starting, now change those coords to what you want.

It should look like

teleportToX = ####//#### teleportToY = ####//####
Just change the ones on the left of the backslashes.

item.dc:creator: @Cheesy_G13 Cheesy_G13
item.description:
@Cheesy_G13 wrote:

Can’t you people helping me?? :([br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2007, 07:36:17 AM[/size][hr]Anyone? <:{[br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2007, 09:41:25 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Sick of Air, post:2, topic:131080”]Question #1:
Go into player.java and search for

// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet

And change the coords under that.

Question #2:
Sorry, I can’t tell you off the top of my head =\

Question #3:
TBH, I don’t know, sorry.[/quote]
There are 4 kind of numbers…? Should i pay attention on other right 2 number?
